attributes.additional_details: Stop shops selling fiyerworks as some kids got hold of them and fort it was funny to shoot them at my horse wich killed him there dangerous and should only be displays only
attributes.background: Stop shops selling fiyerworks as some kids got hold of them and fort it was funny to shoot them at my horse wich killed him there dangerous and should only be displays only

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about the death of your horse.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
